website_summaries.verdict: Climbers who are looking for an aggressive rock shoe that offers superb comfort may end their search with the Oasi. This piece of climbing gear wins the approval of buyers, thanks to its lightweight construction, sufficient support for edging, and sensitivity.However, it is not able to win the hearts of everyone because of its flimsy Velcro straps. All in all, those who can manage to get past its issues may find a good Tenaya climbing shoe in the Oasi because of its send-worthy qualities.
pros: A lot of Tenaya Oasi owners declare in unison that it’s an immensely comfortable climbing shoe
Numerous wearers applaud the minimal break-in period of this remarkable rock shoe
A handful of buyers say that the stiffness of its midsole is suitable for edging
This Tenaya offering is very light, many climbers claim
According to a decent number of consumers and gear critics alike, the rock shoe’s sensitivity makes it ideal for smearing
Purchasers by the dozen commend the stickiness of the Oasi’s Vibram XS Grip outsole
cons: Several individuals say that its Velcro straps detach from the shoe pretty easily
Based on the some reviews, the rubber strip on the Tenaya Oasi’s rear portion is slightly ineffective on heel hooks
A few shoppers mention that this climbing shoe can get a bit stinky

customer_reviews.title: Unnatural heel fit
customer_reviews.text: The heel cup is HUGE, I mean unless you're a gorilla it's not gonna fit properly. Other than that it's quite a comfortable pair of climbing shoes. I've noticed this is a Tenaya issue, as I had the same problem when I tried on the Mundaka.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: 10 moccasins stretched out so I decided to give these a shot because I wanted a more aggressive shoe & I am so happy I got these
customer_reviews.text: My 5.10 moccasins stretched out so I decided to give these a shot because I wanted a more aggressive shoe & I am so happy I got these! The sizing is different from my old shoes so I had to buy 3 different sizes to try on but the 7's seemed to be perfect. I'm a 9.5 women's & these shoes are a 7 men's/8 women's.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for limestone sport climbing.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately boils down to whether a brand fits your feet. If you have narrow feet and like soft responsive shoes the oasi are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around climbing shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe. I can climb for 2-3 hours indoors without needing to take them off, and they work very well for a wide range of boulder/top rope/lead routes. This is my everything shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good climbing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit as desired - they are tight- snug - you will need to give ya feet a rest in between climbs - feet can swell a little trouble to get back on - good performance
customer_reviews.author: Bronson

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are like slippers. They're very comfortable immediately
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like slippers. They're very comfortable immediately. I had almost no break in period with them. The down side is that the rubber is a bit softer than other climbing shoes so I am occasionally slipping off tiny toe holds.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe, great heel and toe support. Fit perfectly with my shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: hook loose a little when much pressure on it,but do well on small holds and slopes
customer_reviews.author: Mr.W

customer_reviews.title: 5 would have been best. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: i wear a 9.5/10 street shoe. 8s have a little room. 7.5 would have been best. Otherwise, spectacular shoe! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Menger

customer_reviews.title: Best climbing shoes ive had
customer_reviews.text: Best climbing shoes ive had. Fit true to size. I went up half size, once they warm up, they mold to your feet. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, High-Performance Bouldering Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The first high-performance climbing shoe I've found that I can wear for 2-hour bouldering sessions multiple days per week with complete comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Greving

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive while not painful:)
customer_reviews.text: These climbing shoes are tight and slightly aggressive, but also feel a little bit cushioned inside which is a nice difference from the toe pinching climbing shoes I've had in the past. That being said, they are tight as expected, but I don't feel like I need to come off of a climb because of any discomfort. I could definitely see myself getting another pair as these are very high-quality, the rubber is great and I like them so much more than the other popular brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, slippery rubber
customer_reviews.text: I found the shoe to be a great fit, close in side to Scarpas. However the rubber was very slick for about the first 3 weeks of climbing. I finally fixed it by rubbing the souls of the shoes together for 10 minutes and breaking off the coating. I've heard this is normal for climbing shoes but found it much worse than other brands I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S Tinney

customer_reviews.title: I will say thanks to Tenaya i feel extra comfortable when leading a route
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel somewhat small but these are my first pair of down turned climbing shoes. I will say thanks to Tenaya i feel extra comfortable when leading a route, great support for both heel and toe.
customer_reviews.author: monique ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been climbing for 16 years now and have tried just about every shoe on the market looking to climb my best. Look no further. These shoes are incredible for steep climbing - They are down-turned and aggressive, though soft enough that you can smear. My favorite thing about them, though is how well they fit the heel. They are like a glove and I can heel hook just about anything both bouldering and route climbing. THESE ARE AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Brayack

customer_reviews.title: Performance & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been climbing for nearly 20 years & this is one of the best shoes I've found thus far. It manages to perform extremely well on both steep and vertical terrain. They are very comfortable and handle well right out of the box without a lot of break in time. I like the 2 strap system for tightening, which makes the shoe fit like a glove. Also, the heel in this shoe does not gape, fits nicely, making heel hooking feel solid. I would highly recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Love

customer_reviews.title: Now thats how aggressive shoes should feel!
customer_reviews.text: I've climbed in many aggressive shoes, on many different levels. For the most part, I felt they all felt the same. Recently, I got a pair of Oasi to try out on my hardest sport project. They fit me perfectly in the heel, and felt surprisingly comfortable all over. The lining was a huge selling point for me. Very soft. I was able to climb longer, and harder with these amazing shoes on. I sent my project that day! Deffently get these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Williamson

product_meta.title: Tenaya Oasi Cat Feet Climbing Shoes, Unisex_Adult
product_meta.description: Increased range of response when we set out the project or if there was a goal above all, we wanted to connect it with all the advantages that a cat foot with curved lines can develop over collapses without losing even a peak of performance on vertical walls, even on friction and adhesion supports; this has required us to redesign part of our production process and develop a number of new technologies; The result is a curve with the highest response range and with unknown comfort levels in a high performance shoe.
feature_bullets: Climbing Gear > Climbing Shoes > Sport Climbing > Men's
